thread.title: Scott Disick Missing Kourtney? Posts Her Bare Pic Calling Her Hot Mama!
thread.title_full: Scott Disick Missing Kourtney? Posts Her Bare Pic Calling Her Hot Mama!

title: Scott Disick Missing Kourtney? Posts Her Bare Pic Calling Her Hot Mama!
text:
Don't ask Again 
Scott Disick can't resist seeing his ex partner, Kourtney Kardashian stripping down completely and flaunting her toned new body. 
The Lord has been impressed after seeing Kourtney Kardashian's artsy photograph from her recent photo shoot . The reality TV star and the mother of his 3 kids bared completely lying on the side and showing her naked derriere. The image is part of photographer Brian Bowen Smith's Metallic Life series which was released 2 days ago. 
Scott Disick now shared the pic of Kourtney on his account and called her a hot mama! Scott captioned the shot, "Now that's 1 hot mama." 
The 32-year-old reality TV star was dumped by the Keeping Up with the Kardashians beauty, after nine years together in July, after he was spotted getting cosy to an ex girlfriend while holidaying in the South of France. 
He also spent last weekend in Miami with an 18-year-old rumoured girlfriend, model Lindsay Vrckovnik. Scott uploaded a pic of them wearing matching fur coats but then deleted it immediately. 
A source close to the 36-year-old Kardashian beauty recently that she is not affected by his new romance, telling People magazine, "She's moving on. She knows it's just a fling."
